mapper.select: select * from tbl_book order by bno

select bno, isbn, title, publisher, thumbnail, url, datetime from ( select rownum rn, bno, isbn, title, publisher, thumbnail, url, datetime from tbl_book where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} order by bno desc
select count(*) from tbl_book where bno > 0
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_book (bno, isbn, title, publisher, thumbnail, url, datetime) values (seq_book.nextval, #{isbn}, #{title}, #{publisher}, #{thumbnail}, #{url}, #{datetime})
